channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Dunkirk
channel.desc: A dramatic reconstruction of the World War II rout at Dunkirk. The Allied defeat and the subsequent frantic evacuation is told through the experiences of three different characters: a cockney corporal and his men separated from their unit; a newspaper reporter who moves from cool detachment to being willing to lay down his life; and a civilian whose eyes are opened by the dramatic events.
